sentences.sContent: ...hormones that have a narcotic effect on the immune system.
sentences.sCn: …对免疫系统有麻醉作用的激素。

synos.tran: [药]麻醉的；有麻醉作用的；催眠的
[药]麻醉药；镇静剂；起麻醉作用的事物

remMethod.val: narc(麻木； 昏迷) + ot + ic → 麻醉的； 催眠的

trans.tranOther: a narcotic drug takes away pain or makes you sleep
a type of drug which makes you sleep and reduces pain
